apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app
spec:
  initContainers:
  - name: wait-db
    image: busybox
    command: ['sh', '-c', 'until nc -z db-service 5432; do sleep 2; done']
  containers:
  - name: app
    image: myapp

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: app
    image: nginx
    volumeMounts:
    - name: logs
      mountPath: /var/log/nginx
  - name: log-shipper
    image: busybox
    command: ['sh', '-c', 'tail -f /logs/access.log']
    volumeMounts:
    - name: logs
      mountPath: /logs
  volumes:
  - name: logs
    emptyDir: {}
